Interface com.chimu.form.mapping.AssociationSlot

public interface AssociationSlot
extends SetterSlot
An AssociationSlot is used when you want to specify that the value of the slot comes through a relationship to another mapper. The different subtypes of association slots handle different variations for how this relationship is stored on the database.

AssociationSlot has three subtypes

  • ForwardAssociationSlot: Where your table has a column that refers to your partner's identity. This can handle N-1 relationships.
  • ReverseAssociationSlot: Where your partner's table has a column that refers to your identity. This can handle 1-N relationship.
  • ExternalAssociationSlot: Where a third association table contains references to both you and your partners identity. This can handle N-M relationships.

See Also:
ForwardAssociationSlot, ReverseAssociationSlot, ExternalAssociationSlot

Method Index

partnerRetriever()
setupContainsPartner()
States that the current object contains the partner objects, so whenever the current object is deleted, all the partner objects are also deleted
setupContainsPartnerNot()
setupUpdatingByDeltas()
Update the associations by keeping track of what changes occured locally and then sending just the changes to the database.
setupUpdatingByReplacing()
Update the associations by making the database mirror the state of the current object

Methods

setupContainsPartner 
 public abstract void setupContainsPartner()
States that the current object contains the partner objects, so whenever the current object is deleted, all the partner objects are also deleted

setupContainsPartnerNot 
 public abstract void setupContainsPartnerNot()
setupUpdatingByDeltas 
 public abstract void setupUpdatingByDeltas()
Update the associations by keeping track of what changes occured locally and then sending just the changes to the database. This means the database is an intersection of changes between this object and any other object interacting with the database

setupUpdatingByReplacing 
 public abstract void setupUpdatingByReplacing()
Update the associations by making the database mirror the state of the current object

partnerRetriever 
 public abstract ObjectRetriever partnerRetriever()
